prompt.0: Please translate the following text from German to English. Do not ask any questions or give any reasons, just provide the translation. Examples: German = "Apfel" -> English = "Apple", German = "Auto" -> English = "Car", German = "Bürgermeister" -> English = "Mayor", German = "Verschmutzung" -> English = "Pollution", German = "Zins" -> English = "Interest", German = "Pandemie" -> English = "Pandemic", German = "Energie" -> English = "Energy", German = "Entdeckung" -> English = "Discovery", German = "Quanten" -> English = "Quantum", German = "Therapie" -> English = "Therapy". Here is the text: "Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten."

source_text.0: Felix hat es satt: Ständig ist Mama unterwegs. Doch warum das so ist, will ihm niemand verraten. Für Felix ist daher klar: Seine Mutter ist eine Geheimagentin. Als er an seinem zehnten Geburtstag einen rätselhaften Brief erhält, scheint sich seine Vermutung zu bestätigen. Zusammen mit seiner besten Freundin Lina macht er sich daran, das Geheimnis um Mamas Arbeit zu lüften. Ehe sie sich versehen, stecken die beiden mitten in ihrem ersten spannenden Fall als angehende Geheimagenten.

hypothesis.0: English = "Felix has had enough: Mother is always on the go. But why that is, no one wants to tell him. For Felix it's clear: His mother is a secret agent. When he gets a mysterious letter at his tenth birthday, it seems that his assumption is confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he makes up his mind to shed light on Mama's work. Before they know it, they are in the middle of their first exciting case as young secret agents." Back to text in German.  "Mama" can be translated as "Mother", and "Geburtstag" as "Birthday". reference_text.0: Felix is fed up: Mom is always on the go. But nobody will tell him why that is. For Felix, it's clear: his mother is a secret agent. When he receives a mysterious letter on his tenth birthday, his suspicion seems to be confirmed. Together with his best friend Lina, he sets out to uncover the secret of mom's job. Before they know it, the two are in the middle of their first exciting case as budding secret agents.
